title: [Atoll, Ivory Path]
description: Rune-carved ivory blocks rest in a neat stack facing the center of the atoll.  The air surrounding the waters within the atoll shifts with motes of alternating light.  Nestled into the side of the blocks is a pair of rodent skeletons, holding each other in death.
